original_text: and does not bring it to the entrance of the tent of meeting to offer it to the Lord, that man shall be cut off from his people.
korean_text: 회막 문으로 가져다가 여호와께 드리지 아니하면 그는 백성 중에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: and does not bring it to the entrance of the tent of meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 회막 입구로 가져오지 않고

sentences.original_text: to offer it to the Lord
that man shall be cut off from his people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 자기 백성 중에서 끊쳐지리라.
